intro: Microcoelia africana, commonly known as the African microcoelia, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. Microcoelia africana is often used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
